mapper.select: select A.iboard, A.title, A.iuser, A.regdt, A.thumbnail, B.favCnt, C.email, C.unm from diaryDB A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT iboard, count(iboard) as favCnt FROM favDB GROUP BY iboard ) B ON A.iboard = B.iboard LEFT JOIN userDB C ON A.iuser = C.iuser WHERE C.email = #{email} ORDER BY A.iboard desc
mapper.insert: insert into diaryDB (title, content, iuser, thumbnail) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{iuser}, #{thumbnail});
mapper.select: select A.title, A.content, B.unm from diaryDB A inner join userDB B on A.iuser = B.iuser where A.iboard = #{iboard}
